title: Bug splat on 1st attemp to play today i guess there is a patch
body: I see that lolpatcher.exe and lolpatcherUx.exe are both running in services and when I try to load the game, I see lollauncher and another lolpatcher.exe come up but they bot leave and nothing happends, ive had this sort of thing b4 but it always started and plus the bug splat might be something bigger, you guys got any options?
